text: The 2013 International GTSprint Series season was the fourth year of the International GTSprint Series. The season began at Monza on 6 April and finished at Vallelunga on 13 October. Thomas Schöffler won the championship, driving an Audi. ==Teams and drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! Team ! Car ! No. ! Drivers ! Class !
